summary: Moves the follower dialogue topic "I need to trade some things with you" up near the top of the list of choices. No longer will you have to scroll down the list or accidentally dismiss your follower every time you want to trade with them!
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][i][color=#ffff00]Skyrim SE version nowÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2992]available[/url][/color][/i][/b]

[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
Moves the follower dialogue topic "I need to trade some things with you" up near the top of the list of choices. No longer will you have to scroll down the list or accidentally dismiss your follower every time you want to trade with them!

In technical terms, it merely changes the [b]Priority[/b] of the [b]DialogueFollowerTradeTopic[/b] from 25 to 93.

[i]NOTE: The image shown is with UFO installed, just to demonstrate compatibility. This mod does not add those other UFO dialogue choices.[/i]

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" link above.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
Download with NMM. Activate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
No known issues.
Recommended mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

author: LazyAltmer
